page.title: 11A.2 Trunk Road - A Busy Road
page.content: If we didn't have the A.2 it would take us hours to get to London and Dover and the other places it leads to. Lots of people who live in Kent go to work in London. Some people travel by train but many go by cars or commuter coach. This makes the road very busy early in the morning and again in the evening when returning home. Hundreds of heavy lorries use this road which is the main route into London from Dover. Some are heading for the Dartford Tunnel with access to motorways going North. Many continental coaches use these routes also. At weekends and holiday times eastbound traffic is heavy to the Kentish resorts and Channel ports.
